fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sob at a player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target and anyone that visits them will receive the mp4 attached to this role card.
- You may sob at your own house at any time. Anyone who visits you will be roleblocked through immunity. They will also receive the mp4 attached to this role card.
- Anyone who receives the mp4 attached to this role card counts as having heard you sob.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that everyone alive at the end of the game has heard you sob.
